description.default: Balanced NanoSite default theme with print-inspired surfaces.

description.default: GitHub-inspired list layout with restrained surfaces.
description.zh: 受 GitHub 启发的列表式布局，平坦而克制。

description.default: Warm charcoal palette, left sidebar, and condensed typography for night reading.
description.zh: 温暖的炭灰配色，左侧侧栏与紧凑排版，适合夜间阅读。
